title: Snapshots of the River Murray
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Dept. of Immigration, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Irrigation - Murray River Region (N.S.W.-S. Aust.)
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Murray River (N.S.W.-S. Aust.)
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Rivers - Victoria
abstract: Scenic attractions of the Murray River in South Australia.
description: The Murray River is shown from a high vantage point, and the river banks are shown from a boat moving along the river. Highlights include: irrigated orchards; paddle-steamers and riverside buildings at Mannum; flocks of birds; sedimentary rock cliffs; a station homestead on the river bank; paddle-steamers berthed at the river bank; fishermen catching Murray cod; dairy farmers with loads of cream cans waiting for a riverboat; tall river gums and cattle grazing on fertile river flats.
